title: Homicide: Life on the Street
fullTitle: Homicide: Life on the Street (TV Series 1993â€“1999)

episodes.title: Bop Gun
episodes.plot: Felton gets a primary case, in which a family gets robbed and the mother is fatally shot. As the team investigates, the father blames himself for the loss.

episodes.title: See No Evil
episodes.plot: Felton's friend kills his ill father in an assisted suicide, and a suspicious Lewis is assigned to the case. Frank and Bayliss investigate the murder of a drug peddler.

episodes.title: Black and Blue
episodes.plot: A victim was shot in the back, and Frank is eager to find out who done it, however nobody believes him when he states the murderer was a cop.

episodes.title: A Many Splendored Thing
episodes.plot: Bayliss and Pembleton investigate the murder of a much-loved woman, only to find that she worked at a phone sex company. Meanwhile, a depressed Detective Munch tags along on Bolander's romantic dinner date after being dumped.
